module.name: design_specific_assignment_to_interconnect_usage_view
module.name.french: Attribution spécifique de conception à la vue d'utilisation de l'interconnexion
module.keywords: module, component feature, part feature, component terminal, swap, interconnect usage view, interconnect, interface control document, intellectual property management

abstract.p: the representation of the assignment of features in an interconnect design view to part terminals in the interconnect usage view. This provides the ability for a design organization to explicitly manage the relationships between the externally published information typically found in an interface control document or catalog and the detailed design items that are the internal implementation of those externally visible features.
abstract.li: assignment of features in an interconnect design to part features in the usage view of the interconnect.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the assignment of features in an interconnect design view to part terminals in the interconnect usage view. This provides the ability for a design organization to explicitly manage the relationships between the externally published information typically found in an interface control document or catalog and the detailed design items that are the internal implementation of those externally visible features.

inscope.li: assignment of features in an interconnect design to part features in the usage view of the interconnect;
items within the scope of application module Fabrication joint, ISO/TS 10303-1668.

outscope.li: assignment of features that are not terminals.

sc.description: All members of this constraint maps to entity with additional constraints in the mapping. All of them require UNIQUE string for ., so ONEOF subtype constraint from ARM is guaranteed as not violated.
